Software engineer, scientist, and furniture enthusiast.

I'm Alison, a software engineer and management consulting professional in the healthcare sector with a special interest in web development, technology evaluation, market analysis, revenue forecasting, and commercialization strategy.

First Capstone Cohort of 2023

February 4, 2023

At the end of 2022, I quit my stable job at Penn State and set off on a new adventure. I joined Launch School's first 2023 Capstone cohort for an intensive deep dive into topics that complement the fundamentals mastered in the robust Core Curriculum.
